resources.string:
Silvia Arias Herguedas
 Héctor Del Campo Pando
 Alberto Gutiérrez Pérez
 David Robles Gallardo

In order for this App to work properly you must grant permissions for:
 -Media files access, mandatory to establish an avatar and to send and receive images.
 -Contacts access, mandatory so we can show your linked agenda names.
 -Location access, mandatory for a proper discover of near bluetooth devices.
Thanks for trusting Bluechat.\nIt\'s the perfect App to talk with other near people, already known or not.
This App needs Bluetooth on the device
At least one contact must be selected
At settings you will be able to change your name and avatar
Chats shows the conversations historial and the groups you are in.
Location is mandatory in order to discover near devices
Media files access is mandatory for order App operation
Device must be visible in order to connect to other devices
BlueChat is an instant messaging application via Bluetooth. You will be able to talk to other near people that also have Bluechat installed on their Android devices.
If you want to discover near people use the refresh button at top-right, you can also swype down discover tab in order to discover new people.
Discover allows you to see near people, with public and enabled bluetooth, with whom to talk.
